LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.label: Cataphract (Thermobaric Rocket Battery)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.description: A specialized medium range siege tank equipped with a multi rocket battery.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.label: Cataphract (Cluster Rocket Battery)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.descriptio: A specialized long range siege tank tank equipped with a cluster rocket battery.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Rocket.label: Cataphract Thermobaric Rocket Launcher
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Rocket.description: A launch system that fires multiple 100mm rockets in short succession. Perfect for burning down your enemies.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_CluRocket.label: Cataphract Cluster Rocket Launcher
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_CluRocket.description: A launch system that fires multiple 57mm cluster rockets in short succession. Perfect for penetrating light armor.
